content:
@Tim Abbott I already checked this page.
As I had never configured zulip, I was in doubt about ldap configuration, despite having configured it correctly, I imagined that an additional authentication tab would appear on the ZULIP login screen, but after some time analyzing logs I realized that authentication via LDAP happens via EMAIL in the login field, without even a reference to LDAP.
I don't know if I looked wrong, but I didn't see that detail in the documentation.
Thanks anyway!!!
Felipe Oliveira has marked this topic as resolved.
